Text:
your image host (and the site you put in torrent titles) has been blocked due to abundance of popups on it.

if you want to share your uploads then it is fine by us.

If you however are uploading in order to cash in using image hosts with popups/etc then you are not welcome here.

If you want a image host then TPB runs one and it is free:

http://bayimg.com/

another one, clean and free:

http://imgbox.com

If you try to go around blocks you will soon find your account banned with all your torrents removed.
